Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black with single added white band near top; exterior: double guilloche pattern between bands.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 253, no. 407, pl. 55)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0186) (phase 2)
